topics.body:
Sooo against better judgement I decided to join FA again and watch a few artists(5) I like.

I'm not going to lie; that site's a massive sore spot for me cause on the one hand I do like a couple artists' but I still remember the shit that used to go on.

What I mean by this is that when the site first came out there was a fuck ton of death threats constantly being flung on the site for stupid shit.  "Oh my fucking god!  You don't have a danmaku of renamon and think that she's over rated?!  I'll stab you in the fucking throat while you're asleep and rape your corpse".  I'm just going to straight up admit it I don't want nothing to do with the furry fandom cause there used to be a lot of racism, heterophobic and sexist hate on the sites early 2000's.  What I mean by this is back in the day your average furry site/con or shit was pretty much, "You 'breeders'(derogatory term for straight people)/women/minorities are ruining the fandom!  I'll stab you in the fucking throat!  FURRY PRIDE!"

I know cons and sites are no longer like this anymore and that con staff and site owners have massively cracked down on this sort of behavior but there is no way in the everliving hell I'm ever going to a con or interacting with furries to any level because of the shit I've seen.  Why?  Cause simply put while I'm talking about the furry fandom here right now I'm talking about the internet and all fandoms actually threatening to kill someone because of their race/sex/sexuality or threatening to kill someone over cartoon characters is massively unacceptable behavior and some times you have to put on your big boy pants, act like a adult and *NOT* threaten to kill someone in their sleep like a psychopath.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f120826368723d533c0000#post_53f120826368723d533c0000
That is one of the main problems with the internet, If you give someone an anonymous voice, They will say stupid shit. (The Stuff at cons was inexcusable though.)

It's a good thing my perceptions were never tainted like yours were. Because I don't know how I would go about my day without some Pokemon fetish porn. (And FA is the only site that mostly doesn't care for humans that I can think of)

topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f120826368723d533c0000#post_53f120826368723d533c0000
Remember the massive anti-Brony and MLP hysteria that took place in the Furry fandom during the early days of this fandom's existence? They're mostly gone now, and were probably just loud minorities. But still, some of the graphic anti-pony "art" they've produced and were stored here, really pisses me off. Furries, of all people to hate us... Then again, I wouldn't consider this fandom as a branch of Furry myself, even though there are Furries in it, and I could care less about how many or whatever fandom people are part of.
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f120826368723d533c0000#post_53f120826368723d533c0000
And besides, Those nuts were probably a Vocal minority.


"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f123996368722c23dc0000#post_53f123996368722c23dc0000
Like I've said a few times Before, I understand why they didn't like ponies taking over everything, But I agree that they were a bit excessive.
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f1234963687204a7480000#post_53f1234963687204a7480000
Yet, we get scrutinized mercilessly by media for being out of ordinary. Even though we Bronies have much better track records than Furries do. But we're a young fandom. And I'm sure Furries themselves were scrutinized by the media at one point or another.
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc
